text.$invariant:
It's essential to choose the right operator that suits your business's needs and budget. That’s where we come in. Automating your commercial or industrial rolling sheet door not only makes entering and exiting your business a breeze, it also improves the security of your door and makes it safer for your employees.

What sets Automatic Technology rolling door openers apart?

contentData.description: Automatic Technology roller door operators allow you and your employees to keep your workspace safe when entering and exiting the building.
contentData.heading: Safe and Secure

contentData.description: Our operators feature in-built automatic reversing smarts which reverses the door if it senses an obstruction is in the way.
contentData.heading: Automatic Smarts

contentData.description: Automatic back drive forces the door back down if it senses an intruder is trying to lift the door, preventing unwanted entry.
contentData.heading: Prevent Unwanted Entry

contentData.description: Automatic Technology roller door operators are easy to install. Automation installation made simple and reliable. You can count on Automatic Technology operators to lift and lower your commercial or industrial rolling sheet door day in and day out for many years to come.
contentData.heading: Easy to Install

contentData.description: Just like your car, your door motor is full of moving parts that require periodic servicing to maintain its performance. Automatic Technology operators have an in-built service reminder that gives you an audio and visual cue when they’re ready for a service.
contentData.heading: In-built Service Reminders

contentData.description: Soft start and stop technology reduces stress on the operator, which allows the door to open and close both quickly and quietly year after year, not just when it’s installed.
contentData.heading: Smooth Operation
